snippet: A hopeful report on European banks prompted a late rally after the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index officially traded in bear-market territory much of the day.
lead_paragraph: A hopeful report on European banks prompted a late rally after the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index officially traded in bear-market territory much of the day.

headline.main: Stocks Rally After Report Europe Might Recapitalize Banks
headline.print_headline: Anticipating a Brutal Fallout: A Chance of Bailouts Ignites Final-Hour U.S. Stock Rally
